reviewText: This show tells a story about a woman who falls in love with her boss, who is a married man. But it obviously gets more complicated than that. It is not amazing by any means. In fact, I hated the ending because it's so emotional. However, I also loved it because I'm a big fan of  (Zhao Wei) and her performance was spectacular. It is definitely a unique touching story that I would recommend to anyone that is a fan of .
